channel.title: lateral root number on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in lateral root number on funPlantGenes

item.title: Cg1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GRMZM5G838324 Gene Symbol: Cg1 Gene Name: Corngrass1 Genome: B73_RefGen_v3 Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Furthermore, a target of Cg1 is teosinte glume architecture1 (tga1)1, a gene known to have had a role in the domestication of maize from teosinte.

item.title: GmEIL4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g274600 Gene Symbol: GmEIL4 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEIL4 enhances soybean (Glycine max) phosphorus efficiency by improving root system development.

item.title: GmWNK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmWNK1 Gene Name: WNK kinase homolog1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean root-specific protein kinase GmWNK1 regulates stress-responsive ABA signaling on the root system architecture.

item.title: ZmPTF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GRMZM2G024530 Gene Symbol: ZmPTF1 Gene Name: Pi starvation-induced transcription factor1 Genome: B73_RefGen_v3 Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: ZmPTF1, a phosphate starvation-induced basic helix-loop-helix (bHLH) transcription factor, contributes to root development and low-phosphate tolerance in maize.
